mapper.select: SELECT id,proCode, proName, proDesc, proContact, proPhone, proAddress, proFax, createdBy, creationDate FROM smbms_provider order by creationDate DESC

SELECT id,proCode, proName, proDesc, proContact, proPhone, proAddress, proFax, createdBy, creationDate FROM smbms_provider
and proCode like CONCAT ('%',#{proCode},'%')
and proName like CONCAT ('%',#{proName},'%')
order by creationDate DESC limit #{form},#{pageSize}

select count(1) from smbms_provider
and proCode like CONCAT ('%',#{proCode},'%')
and proName like CONCAT ('%',#{proName},'%')

SELECT id,proCode, proName, proDesc, proContact, proPhone, proAddress, proFax, createdBy, creationDate FROM smbms_provider
and id=#{id}
